resources.string: Project PokéZukan started at early August 2021.\nThis application serves as a minimalistic Pokédex especially catered for beginners starting the Pokémon game. Hopefully this app would be useful for your journey.
Data and contents are gathered from PokeAPI
HOME Sprites: Gen 1 - 8 by "theSLAYER" from The Project Pokémon
Pokéball placholder image by Andreuvv from wikipedia.org
Type icons by Andreuvv from commons.wikimedia.org
Pokémon Moves Category icons from Pokemondb

PokéZukan is an unofficial, free fan made app and is not affiliated, endorsed or supported by Nintendo, GAME FREAK or The Pokémon Company in any way.Some images used in this app are copyrighted and are supported under fair use.Arts, visuals, names, Pokémon and Pokémon names are properties of the companies mentioned previously.
No copyright or trademark infringement is intended.
